text: John F. "Jake" Ahearn Jr. (January 6, 1918 – February 17, 1968) was an American professional basketball player. He played for the Detroit Eagles in the National Basketball League (NBL) and averaged 5.3 points per game. He competed in several other leagues as well. Ahearn is the cousin of Jerry Bush, who coincidentally also played college basketball at St. John's and then in the NBL. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:1968 deaths Category:American men's basketball players Category:Baltimore Bullets (1944–1954) players Category:Basketball players from New York (state) Category:Detroit Eagles players Category:Guards (basketball) Category:Sportspeople from Brooklyn Category:St. John's Red Storm men's basketball players Category:Wilmington Blue Bombers players
title: Jake Ahearn
